page.title: 08Day in Life of Lynette
page.content: When I got up I washed my face and hands,cleaned my teeth and got drssed.Then I had rice crispies for breakfast.I went outside and Tony and I played with Zoe and Anthony.We were riding our bikes on the pavement. Leanne and Casey came out on their scooter so we put our bikes away and played on the scooter.For dinner we had fish cake and chips and I watched television for a little while.I watched a film.Afterwards Zoe and I played schools and we took it in turns to be the teacher.We had a drink and some biscuits and then played on our roller boots.I fell and hurt my knee but I didn't cry but Zoe fell and she cried and we put a plaster on her knee.Mummy gave us 20p to go to the shop.Zoe bought shoelaces and I bought chewing gum.After tea we watched T.V and went to bed.
